divs: Sighting DetailsMe, my wife and neighbor couple seen it high and bright in the sky heading west to east across southern Fort Wayne, In. It lasted about 60 to 90 seconds. It had no sound, no smoke, no trail, no blinking lights, Just one bright orange light moving to slow to be a falling or shooting star, to fast for aircraft, no tail like a meteor. Then my son told me today about the bright orange light he seen on the 4th of July. I had to write once I found out it went over 140 miles away. Not an aircraft, not at all.
trends: There have been 41 other sightings in Fort Wayne
There was one other sighting in Fort Wayne on or around July 4th 2010
